verses.text: O God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1732"\w* fixed; I will make \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* melody, even \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* glory.

Give \w out|strong="H3559"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* sounds, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* corded instruments: \w the|strong="H3559"\w* dawn \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* awaking \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3559"\w* \w song|strong="H7891"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5782"\w* will give you praise, O Lord, among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* peoples; \w I|strong="H5782"\w* will make melody \w to|strong="H5782"\w* you among \w the|strong="H5782"\w* nations.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* higher than \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heavens: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* unchanging faith than \w the|strong="H3068"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H8064"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5704"\w*, O \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, higher \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; let \w your|strong="H5921"\w* glory \w be|strong="H8064"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

Let \w your|strong="H3605"\w* right hand \w be|strong="H0430"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* give \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H7311"\w* answer, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* loved ones \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* safe \w from|strong="H5921"\w* danger.

\w This|strong="H4616"\w* \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* word \w of|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* holy God: I \w will|strong="H3225"\w* be glad; I \w will|strong="H3225"\w* make Shechem a heritage, measuring out \w the|strong="H3467"\w* valley \w of|strong="H4616"\w* Succoth.

Gilead \w is|strong="H0430"\w* mine; Manasseh \w is|strong="H0430"\w* mine; Ephraim \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* strength \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* head; Judah \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* law-giver;

Moab \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w my|strong="H0669"\w* washpot; \w on|strong="H7218"\w* Edom \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w the|strong="H4519"\w* resting-place \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H0669"\w* shoe; \w over|strong="H7218"\w* Philistia \w will|strong="H3063"\w* I send \w out|strong="H2710"\w* \w a|strong="H2710"\w* glad cry.

Who \w will|strong="H4124"\w* take \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strong town? who \w will|strong="H4124"\w* be \w my|strong="H5921"\w* guide \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*?

Have \w you|strong="H5704"\w* not sent us away \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*, \w O|strong="H4310"\w* God? \w and|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* go not \w out|strong="H5704"\w* \w with|strong="H2986"\w* our armies.
Give us help \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* trouble; \w for|strong="H6635"\w* there \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* help \w in|strong="H0430"\w* man.
With God we \w will|strong="H0120"\w* do great things; \w for|strong="H8668"\w* \w by|strong="H0120"\w* him \w will|strong="H0120"\w* our haters be crushed underfoot.
